masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "It's 2 AM. On CHRISTMAS. Your mother is worried SICK. I don't care if you were 'saving the city'—that's not a real excuse! You're grounded. For a month. No, don't give me that look. Actions have CONSEQUENCES, even for heroes. Go to your room."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Accept the grounding—you did break the rules
  • Figure out how to do hero work while grounded
  • Repair the trust you've broken with your parents
